name: Marisphere 2
description:
(This game is 100% satire, stemming from a joke game I made a few months prior.)

Enter the dreaded Marisphere once more and assume the role of Brae, a survivor of the realm. Explore different realms and explore the (somewhat broken) landscape, you know honestly I have no clue why I made this.

If you're into Mario trying to kill you, or something like The Room, you might like this. Game's about thirty minutes, so yeah.

Follow me at @LNThracia776 on Twitter for updates on other dumb shit I do too
